definition: to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
tone of one's voice when asking a rhetorical question

sentences.english: Significant correlation is found in the abilities of understanding rhetorical question and of using rhetorical question.
sentences.chinese: 學生對反問句的理解能力和運用能力存在顯著相關。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 probes into features of that sentence.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探討泗陽方言正反問句的特點。

sentences.english: Actually, the question is only somewhat rhetorical. Of course process matters!
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這個問題只是稍微帶點反問，過程當然重要。

sentences.english: On the other hand, all these questions were rhetorical.
sentences.chinese: 同時，這些問題也都只是反問句。

sentences.english: XiaShi counter-question fix two now want to do what it is.
sentences.chinese: 夏實反問修二如今想做的事是什麼。

sentences.english: Can you turn the declarative sentence into a rhetorical question?
sentences.chinese: 你能把這個陳述句改成反問句嗎？

sentences.english: Let us think about it, can wine really drown the sorrows?
sentences.chinese: 反問一句，借酒真的能消愁嗎？

sentences.english: Interview your interviewer and ask why he or she enjoys working at the company.
sentences.chinese: 比如你可以反問對方爲什麼喜歡在這家公司工作。

sentences.english: Unhurriedly ask back him, why do you want to know?
sentences.chinese: 優雅地反問他，爲什麼你想知道？

sentences.english: The study aims to distinct covert responses and overt responses.
sentences.chinese: 反問句有隱性應答和顯性應答之別。

sentences.english: After answering his question,she asked back.
sentences.chinese: 回答他的問題之後，她反問他。

sentences.english: Ask for the five sword spirit griffin to why.
sentences.chinese: 反問五嶽劍派上靈鷲來爲何。

definition: to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to ask oneself/to search one's soul/to reach a conclusion after weighing a matter
not to accept as correct (idiom); to object/to disapprove/to take exception to
